name: offshore well production, oil/gas | offshore well, oil/gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2267/documentation

This activity represents all types of offshore drilling operations for the production of crude petroleum oil and natural gas.;;Following the approach of Meili et al. (2021), the emissions due to venting and flaring are excluded from this inventory as they are covered with the new data for the overall venting and flaring in crude oil and natural gas extraction. (as described in chapter 9.2 of Meili et al., 2021). Also, the energy use for well drilling is covered in the general data on energy consumption and not recorded separately for this activity.;Source: C. Meili, N. Jungbluth, M. Bussa (2021) Life cycle inventories of crude oil and natural gas extraction. ESU-services Ltd. commissioned by the Federal Office for the Environment (FOEN) and the â€œVerband der Schweizerischen Gasindustrie (VSG), Schaffhausen, Switzerland, DOI: 10.13140/RG.2.2.29142.78409, http://esu-services.ch/data/public-lci-reports/



All energy uses, materials and emissions for drilling of an offshore bore hole and finishing of the well.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/09:Mining support service activities/091:Support activities for petroleum and natural gas extraction/0910:Support activities for petroleum and natural gas extraction

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of publication in literature and environmental reports. Most data are valid for the end of the 90ties.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data mainly found for GB and NO.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Applied on all offshore drilling operations. There might be differences depending on depth of sea and type of geological formation
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Publication in environmental reports and other literature.
